briefdescription.para: Gets the actual bounds of the shape in points.

detaileddescription.para: This property returns the actual (as rendered on the page) bounding box of the shape. The bounds takes into account shape rotation (if any).

briefdescription.para: Gets the opaque bounds of the shape in points.

detaileddescription.para: This property returns the opaque (i.e. transparent parts of the shape are ignored) bounding box of the shape. The bounds takes the shape rotation into account.

briefdescription.para: Gets the actual size of the shape in points.

detaileddescription.para: This property returns the size of the actual (as rendered on the page) bounding box of the shape. The size takes into account shape rotation (if any).

briefdescription.para: Calculates the bounds of the shape in pixels for a specified zoom factor and resolution.

detaileddescription.para: This method converts BoundsInPoints into rectangle in pixels.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the bounds of the shape in pixels for a specified zoom factor and resolution.

detaileddescription.para: This method converts BoundsInPoints into rectangle in pixels.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the opaque bounds of the shape in pixels for a specified zoom factor and resolution.

detaileddescription.para: This method converts OpaqueBoundsInPoints into rectangle in pixels and it is useful when you want to create a bitmap for rendering the shape with only opaque part of the shape.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the opaque bounds of the shape in pixels for a specified zoom factor and resolution.

detaileddescription.para: This method converts OpaqueBoundsInPoints into rectangle in pixels and it is useful when you want to create a bitmap for rendering the shape with only opaque part of the shape.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the size of the shape in pixels for a specified zoom factor and resolution.

detaileddescription.para: This method converts SizeInPoints into size in pixels and it is useful when you want to create a bitmap for rendering the shape neatly onto the bitmap.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the size of the shape in pixels for a specified zoom factor and resolution.

detaileddescription.para: This method converts SizeInPoints into size in pixels and it is useful when you want to create a bitmap for rendering the shape neatly onto the bitmap.

memberdef.argsstring: (const System::SharedPtr< System::Drawing::Graphics > &graphics, float x, float y, float scale)
memberdef.name: RenderToScale

briefdescription.para: Renders the shape into a Graphics object to a specified scale.

parameterdescription.para: The object where to render to.
The X coordinate (in world units) of the top left corner of the rendered shape.
The Y coordinate (in world units) of the top left corner of the rendered shape.
The scale for rendering the shape (1.0 is 100%).

simplesect.para: The width and height (in world units) of the rendered shape.

memberdef.argsstring: (const System::SharedPtr< System::Drawing::Graphics > &graphics, float x, float y, float width, float height)
memberdef.name: RenderToSize

briefdescription.para: Renders the shape into a Graphics object to a specified size.

parameterdescription.para: The object where to render to.
The X coordinate (in world units) of the top left corner of the rendered shape.
The Y coordinate (in world units) of the top left corner of the rendered shape.
The maximum width (in world units) that can be occupied by the rendered shape.
The maximum height (in world units) that can be occupied by the rendered shape.

simplesect.para: The scale that was automatically calculated for the rendered shape to fit the specified size.

briefdescription.para: Renders the shape into an image and saves into a stream.
Renders the shape into an image and saves into a file.
Base class for ShapeRenderer and OfficeMathRenderer.
